data.text:
@DrPippaM I have this genius idea:"Let's live and not think so much of dying"

It might be not that empathic to say this to the Ukrainians however.
@Gforse1 @DrPippaM Russians have armed their nuclear missiles, that’s a really strong bluff if only it would be
@DrPippaM It's almost considered a crime to suggest people...well...die! Oops...I didn't mean they do, but just maybe possibly they do. 🤣
@DrPippaM They will come up with something else lol
@DrPippaM Don’t you worry , “they” will come up with something without wasting a day
